edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.crawler.Page

    edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.crawler

    • Uses of Page in edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.crawler

      Methods in edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.crawler with parameters of type Page 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean WebCrawler.shouldVisit(Page referringPage, WebURL url)
      Classes that extends WebCrawler should overwrite this function to tell the crawler whether the given url should be crawled or not.
      void WebCrawler.visit(Page page)
      Classes that extends WebCrawler should overwrite this function to process the content of the fetched and parsed page.

    • Uses of Page in edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.fetcher

    • Uses of Page in edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.parser

      Methods in edu.uci.ics.crawler4j.parser with parameters of type Page 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Parser.parse(Page page, java.lang.String contextURL)
      This methods parses an already fetched page and extract the text, html and outgoing links to other pages depending on the content of the page (Binary, Html or Plain) The number of outgoing links parsed is determined by a call to config.getMaxOutgoingLinksToFollow()
